skillsDescription: Who are you? You are passionate about breaking down and understanding complex systems You know how to get things done in a modern data analytics stack - strong SQL skills,  experience with data wrangling and script writing (we use Python/pandas),  and maybe even some experience with data visualization You are a strong critical thinker who excels at working with both technical and non-technical people
description: What is the position? As an insurer,  we have unique insight into the flow of information between different players in the healthcare system.  Oscar’s data team is responsible for ensuring that a data-driven approach is at the heart of every piece of the organization.  From disease modeling to provider contracting to consumer transparency,  we want to use data to change the way the healthcare system works.  As a member of our data team,  you will: Be(come) an expert on healthcare - and apply that expertise to make the entire system better Build analytical tools to provide insight into all corners of our business,  from risk management and clinical operations to customer service and marketing Collaborate with other data team members,  product managers,  and engineers to develop beautiful and data driven tools to help our members understand and navigate the healthcare system
